description: Situated in an attractive part of Verona right opposite the famous Castelvecchio, this restaurant boasts a relaxing ambience with wood ceilings, classic yet informal furnishings, subtle lighting and soft background music. The menu features regional dishes alongside typical Italian fare, as well as the house speciality – meat kebabs cooked on a skewer. There’s also an outdoor space for alfresco dining in summer.
